resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106315</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106315</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087504</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Conflict</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cuberschneidung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conflit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conflito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conflitto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύγκρουση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conflicto</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A collection of downloadable video clips on the theme of Conflict, with guiding questions for students. Clips are drawn from the following PBS WIDE ANGLE documentaries: "Greetings from Grozny" (2002), "Ladies First" (2004), "Suicide Bombers" (2004).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung downloadable videoclips auf dem 
Thema der $überschneidung, mit leitenden Fragen für Kursteilnehmer. 
Clips werden von den folgenden PBS Weitwinkeldokumentarfilmen 
gezeichnet: "Grüße von Grozny" (2002), "Damen zuerst" (2004), 
"Selbstmord-Bomber" (2004).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection de clips visuels downloadable sur 
le thème du conflit, avec des questions de guidage pour des 
étudiants. Des clips sont tirés des documentaires 
GRANDS-ANGULAIRES suivants de PBS : "salutations de Grozni" 
(2002), les "dames en premier" (2004), "bombardiers de suicide" 
(2004).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção de grampos video downloadable no 
tema do conflito, com perguntas guiando para estudantes. Os 
grampos são desenhados dos seguintes documentaries LARGOS do ÂNGULO 
de PBS: "cumprimentos de Grozny" (2002), "senhoras 
primeiramente" (2004), do "bombardeiros suicide" (2004).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di video clip downloadable sul tema
del conflitto, con le domande guidanti per gli allievi. Le clip 
sono estratte dai seguenti documentaries GRANDANGOLARI di PBS: 
"saluti da Groznyi" (2002), "signore in primo luogo" (2004), 
"bombardieri di suicide" (2004).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των τηλεκατεγραφόμενων τηλεοπτικών 
συνδετήρων στο θέμα της σύγκρουσης, με την καθοδήγηση των 
ερωτήσεων για τους σπουδαστές. Οι συνδετήρες προέρχονται 
από τα ακόλουθα ντοκιμαντέρ PBS WIDE.ANGLE: 
"Χαιρετισμοί από το Γκρόζνυ" (2002), "κυρίες πρώτα" 
(2004), "βομβαρδιστικά αεροπλάνα αυτοκτονίασ" (2004).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de clips video downloadable en el 
tema del conflicto, con las preguntas de guía para los estudiantes. 
Los clips se trazan de los documentaries GRANANGULARES 
siguientes de PBS: "saludos de Grozny" (2002), "señoras 
primero" (2004), "bombarderos del suicidio" (2004).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087504</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106315</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/conflict</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
